thread.title: Julie D
thread.title_full: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Julie D

author: Julie D
title: Julie D
text: Great experience from the sales to installation. Emory on the sales side was very accommodating because I Quote: d the carpet about 100 different ways and was super nice and friendly about it. The installers worked quickly and did a great job moving the furniture. I would totally recommend and would use them again.
